    • Method Detail

      • append

        public MenuBuilder append(java.lang.String key,
                          MenuItemType type,
                          MenuItemListener listener)
        Appends a new entry to the MenuBuilder
        Parameters:
        key - The by dots split path to the menu entry
        type - The MenuItemType to determine functionality
        listener - The onClick event
        Returns:
        The MenuBuilder itself for further .append(...) calls see https://github.com/thamma/GuiUtils for an example and further information
